definitions.definition: pay out (money) in buying or hiring goods or services.
examples: the firm has spent $100,000 on hardware and software

definitions.definition: pay out (money) for a particular person's benefit or for the improvement of something.
examples: the college spent $140 on each of its students

definitions.definition: used to show the activity in which someone is engaged or the place where they are living over a period of time.
examples: she spent a lot of time traveling
synonyms: while away More"the morning was spent gardening"put in
devote; waste "I've spent hours on this essay"

definitions.definition: use or give out the whole of; exhaust.
examples: she couldn't buy any more because she had already spent her money
synonyms: drain "the storm had spent its force"
